h2_title: Son of Stones Boss Fight and Guide
content: Land behind the Sone of Stones on the cliff and then attack to start the fight. He won't immediately jump up, so you can get a couple of free hits in.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Son_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Son of Stones', specifically from the subsection 'Son of Stones Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Land behind the Sone of Stones on the cliff and then attack to start the fight. He won't immediately jump up, so you can get a couple of free hits in.
